original: @169b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @169b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: badzra dha ra sam g'i ti stu ti /
analyzed: badzra dha ra sam g'i ti stu ti /
translated: VajradharasangÄ«tistuti

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: rdo rje 'dzin pas legs par gsungs pa'i bstod pa /
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pas legs par gsungs pa'i bstod pa /
translated: Praise of the Well-Spoken by Vajradhara

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to all the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas!

original: mtshungs med stobs ldan mnyam nyid snying por gyur pa'i chos mnga' ba //
analyzed: mtshungs med stobs ldan mnyam nyid snying por gyur pa'i chos mnga' ba //
translated: You possess the incomparable, powerful, and equal essence of phenomena,

original: thugs rje'i bdag can 'gro ba rnams kyi sdug bsngal 'joms mdzad pa //
analyzed: thugs rje'i bdag can 'gro ba rnams kyi sdug bsngal 'joms mdzad pa //
translated: The lord of compassion, you destroy the suffering of beings,

original: yon tan ma lus kun ldan dngos grub thams cad sbyin mdzad cing //
analyzed: yon tan ma lus kun ldan dngos grub thams cad sbyin mdzad cing //
translated: Endowed with all good qualities, you grant all spiritual powers,

original: dri med stobs ldan mnyam med mchog gi chos rab dang ldan pa //
analyzed: dri med stobs ldan mnyam med mchog gi chos rab dang ldan pa //
translated: Stainless, powerful, incomparable, and endowed with the supreme Dharma,

original: nam mkha' mnyam pa dag gi yon tan rdul phran zer mi yod //
analyzed: nam mkha' mnyam pa dag gi yon tan rdul phran zer mi yod //
translated: Your qualities are equal to space, free from dust and particles,

original: dpe ni mtshams kyi pha rol 'ga' zhig na yang dmigs pa min //
analyzed: dpe ni mtshams kyi pha rol 'ga' zhig na yang dmigs pa min //
translated: No example can be found anywhere,

original: dpe las rnam par 'das pa'i dngos grub ma lus dam pa rnams //
analyzed: dpe las rnam par 'das pa'i dngos grub ma lus dam pa rnams //
translated: Beyond all examples, you grant all spiritual powers without exception,

original: mtha' yas sems can khams la mchog gi dngos grub sbyin par mdzad //
analyzed: mtha' yas sems can khams la mchog gi dngos grub sbyin par mdzad //
translated: Granting the supreme spiritual power to the infinite realms of beings.

original: rtag tu dri med thugs rje'i shugs kyis bzhengs pa'i smon lam can //
analyzed: rtag tu dri med thugs rje'i shugs kyis bzhengs pa'i smon lam can //
translated: Always standing by the power of stainless compassion, having the prayer

original: dngos grub ji srid 'gog pa med pa'i chos nyid dang ldan pa //
analyzed: dngos grub ji srid 'gog pa med pa'i chos nyid dang ldan pa //
translated: Endowed with the nature of the unobstructed accomplishment of powers for as long as existence lasts,

original: ma lus mchog tu sgrub par mdzad pa skye dgu rnams kyi don //
analyzed: ma lus mchog tu sgrub par mdzad pa skye dgu rnams kyi don //
translated: The one who accomplishes the welfare of all beings in the highest way,

original: rtag tu rnam par bzhed pa thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid rnams //
analyzed: rtag tu rnam par bzhed pa thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid rnams //
translated: The one who always has the intention of the nature of great compassion,

original: 'gag pa med pa nyid du thugs rjes kun nas spyod ldan la //
analyzed: 'gag pa med pa nyid du thugs rjes kun nas spyod ldan la //
translated: The one who is endowed with the conduct of compassion in the unobstructed state,

original: mi g-yo rab gsal 'jig rten gsum na dngos grub mchog rnams gnang //
analyzed: mi g-yo rab gsal 'jig rten gsum na dngos grub mchog rnams gnang //
translated: The one who grants the supreme powers in the three worlds without wavering and clearly,

original: dpag med gzhal du med la legs pa nyid du snyoms zhugs pa'i //
analyzed: dpag med gzhal du med la legs pa nyid du snyoms zhugs pa'i //
translated: The one who is well-equipoised in the immeasurable and incalculable,

original: rtogs shing mkhyen pa'i chos nyid shin tu ngo mtshar rmad du byung //
analyzed: rtogs shing mkhyen pa'i chos nyid shin tu ngo mtshar rmad du byung //
translated: The one with the nature of realization and knowledge, the one with the most amazing and marvelousðŸ”½I, the one who grants the supreme of the supreme accomplishments of the three commitments,

original: dam tshig gsum gyi dngos grub mchog gi mchog sbyin mdzad pas bdag / mchog stsol stsal na rtag tu mchog gi rtogs pa'i rtogs dang ldan //
analyzed: dam tshig gsum gyi dngos grub mchog gi mchog sbyin mdzad pas bdag / mchog stsol stsal na rtag tu mchog gi rtogs pa'i rtogs dang ldan //
translated: If granted, always endowed with the realization of the supreme,

original: 'jig rten gsum na mchog sbyin mchog rnams mtha' dag grub pa po //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum na mchog sbyin mchog rnams mtha' dag grub pa po //
translated: The bestower of boons, the supreme one in the three worlds, the accomplisher of all,

original: dus gsum gshegs pa'i mgon po sgrib pa kun nas mi mnga' ba'o//
analyzed: dus gsum gshegs pa'i mgon po sgrib pa kun nas mi mnga' ba'o//
translated: The protector who has gone in the three times, free from all obscurations.

original: @170a * // dam tshig gsum gyi rgyal po'i rtog pa nas gsungs pa //
analyzed: @170a * // dam tshig gsum gyi rgyal po'i rtog pa nas gsungs pa //
translated: As stated in the Tantra of the King of the Three Pledges,

original: rdo rje 'dzin pas legs par gsungs pa'i bstod pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pas legs par gsungs pa'i bstod pa'o //
translated: This praise was spoken well by Vajradhara.

original: dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o//
translated: Translated by the monk Tsultrim Gyaltsen.
